title: Manage Regional Blackout for a Sports Game
description: Due to broadcast rights, a live football game must be blacked out for viewers in a specific city. An agent must apply the blackout rule.

tasks.description: Identify the live game feed and the specific geographic region (zip codes) for the blackout.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the game and the list of affected zip codes.

tasks.description: Apply the blackout rule to the content delivery system, blocking access for users in the specified zip codes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully configures the system to enforce the blackout.

tasks.description: Configure the system to show a 'This game is not available in your area' message to the blocked users.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the correct messaging for affected users.
